<<<api>>>: Activity.findViewById
<<<code>>>: public class SearchView {
    private MenuActivity menuActivity;
    public SearchView(Activity activity) {
        menuActivity = (MenuActivity) activity;
        menuActivity.searchButton = (ImageView) activity.findViewById(R.id.searchButton);
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: To initialize an activity, you need to pass an instance of the activity to the constructor of the other class. In this case, you can pass the activity as a parameter to the constructor of the SearchView class. Then, you can cast the activity to the specific activity class (MenuActivity) and use the findViewById method to find the searchButton view.
